system.description:
Summons a salamander, an elemental of fire, under the caster's control. There must be a large enough fire in the area to allow the salamander to manifest; usually this requires a fire that is larger than a camp fire. While the spell lasts the salamander will follow the caster's commands; once the spell ends the salamander dissipates back into the largest fire available.

Your GM will have details of salamanders. Each success in the margin will add one dice to one of the salamander's Resistances or Abilities.
